Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur and Debt in the Stone Age
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc encompasses the initial stories focusing on Alley Oop's daily life, including dealing with a clam debt, dinosaur riding troubles, and the introduction of dinosaur trading and sales.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Debt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Alley Oop's character through his rescue of King Guz and immediate demand for repayment of a debt, highlighting his opportunistic and somewhat mercenary personality.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Tree Troubles
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Alley Oop's dinosaur riding difficulties, introducing the theme of the old dinosaur's clumsiness and setting up the later dinosaur trading arcs.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dealership and Purchase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the concept of dinosaur trading and dealerships, following two cavemen as they consider and purchase a new dinosaur model, adding a humorous, consumerist element to the prehistoric setting.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zip-Pippy Test Drive and Unexpected Bite

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Farewell and Trade-In
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the old dinosaur storyline with a sentimental farewell and transitions to Alley Oop trading in Dinny, linking back to the dinosaur dealership theme.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to Honest Zog's Dealership with Dinny
Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Price Haggling

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Voice and Unintentional Chaos
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the unexpected return of Dinny and the chaotic events that ensue, including mistaken mistreatment and a charge towards 'boomer kids'.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Defense and Comfort
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene deals with Dinny being mistakenly accused of mistreating a dinosaur and then being comforted by a large dinosaur, creating a moment of unexpected tenderness amidst the potential chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: Comfort and Reassurance from the Large Dinosaur
The Impending Charge and Boomer Kid Preparation

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rejection and Fishing Fiasco
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores Alley Oop's romantic rejection by Ooola and transitions into a fishing scene filled with noise complaints and humorous insults.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Ooola's Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a fishing plan and Alley Oop's invitation to Ooola, leading to her unexpected rejection and a shift in their relationship dynamic.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Noise Complaints
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene transitions to a fishing scene with general complaints about women and then focuses on noise conflicts among fishermen, creating humorous interactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Noise and Womanly Insult

Major_Arcs.title: Oola's Romantic Entanglements and Jealousy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around Oola's romantic interests, sparking jealousy and leading to physical confrontations and reflections on romance.

sub_scenes.title: News of Romantic Rival and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the news of a romantic rival for Oola, leading to disbelief and eventual confirmation of Oola's interest in another man.

narrative_arcs.title: Confronting the Truth of Oola's Infidelity

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Attack and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a violent jealous attack and its immediate aftermath, including rejection and the muscular caveman's bitter realization about romance.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Advice and French Technique
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a discussion about different approaches to romance, contrasting violent tactics with 'French' romantic techniques, leading to an attempt to learn these techniques.

sub_scenes.title: Flower, Branch, and Crocodile Romance Failures
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts humorous attempts at romantic gestures with flowers and a branch, culminating in a comical mishap involving a crocodile, highlighting the cavemen's ineptitude in romance.

narrative_arcs.title: The Branch Offering and the Crocodile

sub_scenes.title: Finger-Eating Accusation and Hand-Kissing Twist
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases a series of misunderstandings and escalating conflicts, from jealousy and anger to accusations of cannibalism, culminating in a surprising twist involving hand-kissing.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusation and Romantic Reconciliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows an accusation of infidelity against Alley Oop, public shaming, and his attempt at reconciliation through romantic gestures, leading to a tentative acceptance.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Forgiveness and Frenchman Insult

Major_Arcs.title: The Twist Dance Craze and its Disastrous Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes dance crazes, focusing on the 'Twist' and its absurdly dangerous effects, culminating in widespread injuries and hospital chaos.

sub_scenes.title: Twist Dance Injuries and Lessons
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'Twist' dance and its immediate consequences - injuries - and depicts Ooola's attempt to teach Alley Oop, highlighting his resistance and clumsiness.

narrative_arcs.title: 决心学习舞蹈和有条件的教学
课程结束与弗洛格小姐

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Party and Hospital Chaos
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the night of the 'Twitch Party,' Alley Oop's attempt to dance, public mockery, and the revelation of the dance's widespread injury-causing effects, leading to a hospital emergency.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to Spain for Historical Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a science fiction plot involving time travel to 16th-century Spain for historical research, following the researchers' plan and Alley Oop's journey.

sub_scenes.title: The Spanish History Research Problem
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the historical research problem and the idea of using time travel to obtain firsthand information about 16th-century Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: 西班牙历史研究的难题
派遣艾 Alley Oop 获取真相

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interlude and Time Machine Activation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a romantic moment between Alley Oop and Ooola, juxtaposed with the scientist preparing and activating the time machine, setting up Alley Oop's imminent departure.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in 20th Century and Spain Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Alley Oop and Ooola's arrival in the 20th century, Dr. Wonmug's briefing about the Spain mission, and Alley Oop's initial reluctance and eventual agreement.

sub_scenes.title: Spanish Serenade and Alley Oop's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with Alley Oop's arrival in Spain and quickly transitions to a street serenade scene, where Alley Oop intervenes, leading to unexpected consequences.

narrative_arcs.title: 女友的愤怒与身份揭露

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Substitution and Stone Age Performance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chaotic aftermath of Alley Oop's intervention, leading to the plan of using Alley Oop as a substitute bullfighter and his unconventional, club-wielding performance in the arena.

narrative_arcs.title: 斗牛比赛延误与替补方案
竞技场观众与经理的初步反应

sub_scenes.title: Return to 20th Century and Romantic Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene marks Alley Oop's return to the 20th century, where he faces a romantic accusation from Ooola despite completing his mission, ending the Spain adventure.

narrative_arcs.title: 竞技场上的赞扬与讽刺

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Royal Discontent
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous concept of 'King for a Day,' showing the initial honor and subsequent chaos and rejection of the temporary king by his people.

sub_scenes.title: The Crowning and Royal Proclamation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'King for a Day' concept, the initial honoring of the king, and the ambitious caveman's plan to disrupt the perceived ease of being king.

Major_Arcs.title: Domestic and Financial Chaos with Guz
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on domestic and financial disputes involving Guz, highlighting his chaotic home life and interactions with Ooma and others.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Pills and Cleaning Conflicts
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a domestic dispute between Guz and Ooma over ulcer pills and cleanliness, showcasing their combative relationship.

sub_scenes.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Man's Selfish Solution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a financial dispute over clams, and the King's attempt to resolve it using the wise man, who ultimately resolves it for his own benefit.

sub_scenes.title: Palace Fight and Self-Serving Advice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts violence outside the palace and the wise man continuing to offer self-serving financial advice to the King.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and Palace Fight
The King's Dinner and Ulcer Concern

sub_scenes.title: Apologies, Job Refusal, and Ruler Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features apologies after violence, a refusal of a job offer, and a caveman's relief at returning to ordinary life, followed by a proposal for Alley-How to become ruler.

narrative_arcs.title: Apology and Explanation After an Incident
Joy of Returning to Ordinary Life
Measuring and Speculation About a Strange Duck

sub_scenes.title: Fortune Telling, Sudden Departure, and Barbershop
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a series of brief, somewhat disconnected scenes including fortune telling, a sudden departure, and a barbershop visit, showcasing diverse aspects of caveman life.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Mishap and Roman Visitor
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the narrative with a return to science fiction elements, showing a time machine malfunction leading to the unexpected arrival of a Roman soldier and the scientist's resolution to fix the machine.
